name: Jonk, Inc
description: The never ending quest to build the empire of dirt has brought you to this game.  Jonk, Inc is a cutting edge idle game that lets you build, manage and expand fantasy junkyard worlds.  Buy tow trucks and forklifts to move the jonks.  Find jonks on the marketplace.  Get some sweet Barn Finds to make your dirt shine.  Buy tools and and rent them to customers only to have customers break them.  Pull parts off cars to stock your parts shop.  Water your empire of dirt with upgrades and automate tasks.  If your dreams are made of dirt then you need this game.
